text: Hemipilia forrestii is a species of plant in the family Orchidaceae. It is endemic to China. It was named in honour of George Forrest (1873-1932). == Sources == * China Plant Specialist Group 2004. Hemipilia forrestii. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 21 August 2007. Category:Endemic orchids of China forrestii Category:Vulnerable plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Hemipilia forrestii
